title: To the Honorable the Knights, citizens and burgesses in Parliament assembled. The humble petition of the gentry, clergie, and others [sic] inhabitants, subscribed of the counties of Flint, Denbigh, Montgomery, Carnarvan, Anglesey, Merioneth, being the sixe shires of Northwales. As it was presented this present March the 5th. 1641. Accompanied with thirty thousand hands.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for, F. Couls and R. Phillips,
